long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Picas makes your photo into a piece of art! It combines deep neural networks and artificial intelligence to automatically redraw photos into famous art effects. Choose your favorite filters, create unique and amazing photo artworks and share them to Instagram, Facebook and Twitter to impress your friends and followers!
